Articles.Content:
I recently bought a receiver for xbox controllers and have been trying to get it to work with ksp.

this is the driver I downloaded https://github.com/d235j/360Controller/releases/tag/v0.13.1-unofficial

and this http://www.amazon.ca/HDE-Wireless-Receiver-Xbox360-Controller/dp/B0096PLB9O/ref=cm_cr_pr_product_top

is what I bought. the control pane for 360 controllers finds the input correctly but when i try to use within ksp nothing happens.

edit: works well with Race the Sun.

Edited April 2, 2015 by Kurbis
Have you set up the controller for KSP in the Input Settings? Make sure you click the axis buttons when binding you thumb sticks.
